summary: Completed comprehensive testing of CEnT-S monitoring website. All backend APIs and frontend functionality working perfectly. Successfully tested Google OAuth integration, dashboard, Telegram setup, alert toggles, and notification history.
passed_tests: Backend API root endpoint (/api/) - returns correct message
Backend API health check (/api/health) - scraper running: true, telegram configured: true
Backend API availability endpoint (/api/availability) - returns 21 CENT@CASA spots, 0 currently available
Backend API telegram bot info (/api/telegram/bot-info) - returns bot username: centstest_alert_bot
Backend API authentication (/api/auth/me) - working with session tokens
Backend API notification history (/api/notifications/history) - working correctly
Backend API telegram connection (/api/users/telegram) - chat_id connection working
Backend API alert settings update (/api/users/alerts) - telegram alert toggle working
Landing page loads correctly with 'Continue with Google' button
Dashboard loads and displays CENT@CASA availability table with 21 sessions
Telegram alert toggle works correctly (found enabled state for test user)
History page navigation and display working (shows empty state correctly)
Telegram setup page loads with bot username @centstest_alert_bot
Logout functionality working - redirects to landing page
All navigation elements (back button, history link) working correctly
User authentication flow working with session cookies
All visual elements (pulse indicators, neon text, dark theme) working correctly
